events.message: The policyholder reported an auto collision that occurred yesterday involving their vehicle and a tree on Main Street.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the car and collision damage.
An agent was assigned to handle this auto claim to ensure proper follow-up and coordination for repairs.
The claim was acknowledged promptly, and the customer was informed that the process to evaluate damages has started.
We requested the policyholder to submit photos of the vehicle damage and a police report to support the investigation.
The insured has promptly submitted all requested documents including the police report and several photos of the car damage.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has begun, including review of the submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded showing the collision was caused by road obstruction and no fault from the insured driver.
A settlement offer was prepared covering repairs to the vehicle and alternative transportation reimbursement.
The customer responded positively, expressing appreciation for the quick handling and fair settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved and all repair costs along with approved reimbursements were authorized.
Payment was issued directly to the repair shop and reimbursement was transferred to the insuredâ€™s bank account.
The claim was closed successfully after confirmation that all payments were completed and the customer was satisfied.
All documents and claim details have been archived in accordance with company policy for future reference if needed.
